select data_id, sys_flag, data_order, del_flag, create_date, create_user, create_user_disp, modify_date, modify_user, modify_user_disp, project_stage_id, project_stage_name, expert_professional, expert_count, expert_area, interval_time, extract_weight_in, extract_weight_out, company_avoid, bak1, bak2, bak3, bak4, bak5, bak6 from zjk_extract_config where 1=1
and data_id like '%${dataId}%'
and sys_flag like '%${sysFlag}%'
and data_order like '%${dataOrder}%'
and del_flag like '%${delFlag}%'
and create_date like '%${createDate}%'
and create_user like '%${createUser}%'
and create_user_disp like '%${createUserDisp}%'
and modify_date like '%${modifyDate}%'
and modify_user like '%${modifyUser}%'
and modify_user_disp like '%${modifyUserDisp}%'
and project_stage_id like '%${projectStageId}%'
and project_stage_name like '%${projectStageName}%'
and expert_professional like '%${expertProfessional}%'
and expert_count like '%${expertCount}%'
and expert_area like '%${expertArea}%'
and interval_time like '%${intervalTime}%'
and extract_weight_in like '%${extractWeightIn}%'
and extract_weight_out like '%${extractWeightOut}%'
and company_avoid like '%${companyAvoid}%'
and bak1 like '%${bak1}%'
and bak2 like '%${bak2}%'
and bak3 like '%${bak3}%'
and bak4 like '%${bak4}%'
and bak5 like '%${bak5}%'
and bak6 like '%${bak6}%'
order by ${iSortCol} ${sSortDir_0}
